definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The new progress of investigation of the organogermanium compounds is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了有機鍺化合物研究在國內的新進展。

sentences.english: The group doped its germanium with phosphorous, which has five outer electrons.
sentences.chinese: 這個團隊對鍺進行了磷原子摻雜，它含有5個電子。

sentences.english: AimTo observe the inhibitory effect of germanium ferulic acid on the tumor U_(14 ).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察阿魏酸鍺對小鼠子宮頸癌14號的作用。

sentences.english: Until today germanium is the present substance on earth with no exception.
sentences.chinese: 直至今天鍺才毫無異議地成爲地球上是純淨的物質。

sentences.english: And subsequently germanium tetrachloride 88 was synthesized and measured to be 1.88.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，四氯化鍺被合成出來了，密度測量出是1。

sentences.english: The rich germanium-garnoderma lucidum mycelia can enhancement of humam immunologic function and significantly anti-senility effect.
sentences.chinese: 芝菌鍺具有提高機體免疫功能和抗衰老的作用。

sentences.english: A benzfluorenone spectrophotometric method is introduced for the determination of germanium in organic germanium beverage.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了測定有機鍺飲料中的鍺的苯芴酮分光光度法。

sentences.english: A benzfluorenone spectrophotometric method is introduced for the determination of germanium in organic germanium beverage.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了測定有機鍺飲料中的鍺的苯芴酮分光光度法。

sentences.english: One factory of Ge usually takes up the methods of hydro-metallurgy and fiery-metallurgy to distill the Ge in the coal.
sentences.chinese: 該地區某鍺廠通常採用水冶法和火冶法提取煤中鍺。

sentences.english: One factory of Ge usually takes up the methods of hydro-metallurgy and fiery-metallurgy to distill the Ge in the coal.
sentences.chinese: 該地區某鍺廠通常採用水冶法和火冶法提取煤中鍺。

sentences.english: They can be manufactured on such materials as silicon or germanium.
sentences.chinese: 它們可以鍍在硅或鍺等材料上。

sentences.english: The researchers inject pairs of electrons and holes into the germanium.
sentences.chinese: 研究者們注射成對的電子和凹陷到鍺中。

sentences.english: Used in manufacture of organic germanium and in chemical industry, etc.
sentences.chinese: 該產品用於生產有機鍺，化工等。

sentences.english: In this paper the phase evolution in the solidification process of germanium under high pressure is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 報道了鍺在高壓下固化時亞穩相的形成和轉化。

sentences.english: Two kinds of new determination methods of germanium in Xilinguole League lignite were established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了兩種測定錫盟鍺礦褐煤中鍺的新方法。

sentences.english: Two kinds of new determination methods of germanium in Xilinguole League lignite were established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了兩種測定錫盟鍺礦褐煤中鍺的新方法。

definition: plant mentioned in Book of Songs, uncertainly identified as carambola or star fruit (Averrhoa carambola)
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
Shi, name of river in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan
